amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-407 to allow a closed-end investment company, an entity that invests in securities using money raised in its initial public offering, to invest its assets in securities issued by private funds.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows a closed-end investment company, an entity that invests in securities using money raised in its initial public offering, to invest its assets in securities issued by private funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 270 - 154 (Roll no. 71).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 270 - 154 (Roll no. 71).
